description: Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update. If an existing instance is found and this flag is set there will be an error.

Gift_HierarchyObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Gift_HierarchyObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Gift_HierarchyObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

validation.validation: Gift Hierarchy Name already exists. Provide a unique Gift Hierarchy Name.

Gift_Hierarchy_Data.description: Boolean value indicating if the Gift Hierarchy ID will be included in the display of the Gift Hierarchy Name.
Whether or not a gift is inactive.

Organization_SubtypeObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Organization_SubtypeObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Organization_SubtypeObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Gift_Hierarchy_Data.description: Reference to an existing Organization Subtype valid for Gift Hierarchies.

validation.validation: Organization Subtype is not valid for Organization Type
validation.description: Organization Subtype needs to be valid for Organization Type.

Gift_HierarchyObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Gift_Hierarchy_Data.description: Gift Hierarchy contained within Gift Hierarchy.

validation.validation: Cannot include an inactive Gift Hierarchy in another Gift Hierarchy tree.
The superior Gift Hierarchy must be active, may not contain any of the same active Gifts, and may not be equal to or a descendant of the current Gift Hierarchy.
A hierarchy structure is defined on this organization. Please delete the hierarchy structure before assigning any superior organization.

GiftObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

GiftObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

GiftObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Gift_Hierarchy_Data.description: Gifts that are contained in this level of the Gift Hierarchy.

validation.validation: Inactive Gift Hierarchies may not contain any Gifts.
The Gift Hierarchy may not contain Gifts that are already in the hierarchy tree.

description: Wrapper Element that includes Gift Hierarchy and Data

validation.validation: A top-level Hierarchy Structure exists and is enforced for this hierarchy. Please unenforce the top-level Hierarchy Structure first before changing the Organization Subtype for this hierarchy.
A top-level Hierarchy Structure exists and is enforced for this hierarchy. Please unenforce the top-level Hierarchy Structure first before changing the parent hierarchy.
A top-level hierarchy structure exists and is enforced for this parent hierarchy. Please unenforce the top-level hierarchy structure first before selecting this as a parent hierarchy.
